notification.accessRequest.title: OpusCapita - User Access Request
notification.accessRequest.description:
"The user {firstName} {lastName} ({email}) has requested access to your company account {supplierName}.
    
Please click this link to view details of the request. "
notification.accessApproval.title: OpusCapita - User Access Approved
notification.accessApproval.description:
Your access request to company {supplierName} has been approved.
    
Please click this link below to complete access.
notification.accessRejection.title: OpusCapita - User Access Regected
notification.accessRejection.description: Unfortunately your access request to company {supplierName} has been rejected.
